subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4756 is on the way
description_text:
Hello,

I’m glad to finally see this being shipped, but while checking on DHL’s
website I saw a problem - the destination country is wrong… it is supposed
to arrive in Romania, but the destination country on DHL’s website says
Portugal. See attached pictures.

How can we remedy this?

Thanks,
Andrei

conversations.body_text:
Anything please? I’d like to know what is going on here…

On Sat, 27 Dec 2025 at 14:30, Andrei Vasilescu <avasilescu98@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Hello,
>
> I’m glad to finally see this being shipped, but while checking on DHL’s
> website I saw a problem - the destination country is wrong… it is supposed
> to arrive in Romania, but the destination country on DHL’s website says
> Portugal. See attached pictures.
>
> How can we remedy this?
>
> Thanks,
> Andrei
>
>

I’m coming back here - my package has been delivered now in Portugal as per
attached. How is this even possible when my shipping address is in Romania??



On Mon, 29 Dec 2025 at 14:28, Andrei Vasilescu <avasilescu98@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Anything please? I’d like to know what is going on here…
>
> On Sat, 27 Dec 2025 at 14:30, Andrei Vasilescu <avasilescu98@gmail.com>
> wrote:
>
>> Hello,
>>
>> I’m glad to finally see this being shipped, but while checking on DHL’s
>> website I saw a problem - the destination country is wrong… it is supposed
>> to arrive in Romania, but the destination country on DHL’s website says
>> Portugal. See attached pictures.
>>
>> How can we remedy this?
>>
>> Thanks,
>> Andrei
>>
>>

Hi Andrei Vasilescu,    We apologize for any inconvenience caused. This is your correct shipping tracking information—please rest assured. Happy New Year!  https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326637067DE&cid=c_dhl_2502061_2353

Thank you, Happy New Year!


On Wed, 31 Dec 2025 at 11:30, service@simsonn.com

Happy New Year!

Thank you for the proper link - I can’t help but ask again if there are any
new updates since on DHL it still appears as if the parcel hasn’t even left
yet.

Thank you,
Andrei



On Wed, 31 Dec 2025 at 11:30, service@simsonn.com

Kind reminder.. it’s been almost 30 days since I placed the order and paid
for it.

Andrei

On Thu, 8 Jan 2026 at 08:32, Andrei Vasilescu <avasilescu98@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Happy New Year!
>
> Thank you for the proper link - I can’t help but ask again if there are
> any new updates since on DHL it still appears as if the parcel hasn’t even
> left yet.
>
> Thank you,
> Andrei
>
>
>
> On Wed, 31 Dec 2025 at 11:30, service@simsonn.com

This is absurd already and you are not even answering my emails. If this
carries on, I’ll raise a refund request

On Mon, 12 Jan 2026 at 02:05, Andrei Vasilescu <avasilescu98@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Kind reminder.. it’s been almost 30 days since I placed the order and paid
> for it.
>
> Andrei
>
> On Thu, 8 Jan 2026 at 08:32, Andrei Vasilescu <avasilescu98@gmail.com>
> wrote:
>
>> Happy New Year!
>>
>> Thank you for the proper link - I can’t help but ask again if there are
>> any new updates since on DHL it still appears as if the parcel hasn’t even
>> left yet.
>>
>> Thank you,
>> Andrei
>>
>>
>>
>> On Wed, 31 Dec 2025 at 11:30, service@simsonn.com

Hi Andrei Vasilescu,     Apologies for the delayed response. Our German warehouse has informed us that DHL is still investigating the matter, and a shipment destined for Romania has been held up. We will urge them to provide updates promptly or arrange for a replacement shipment.

Please do your best, it’s been too long already..

Thank you,
Andrei

On Thu, 15 Jan 2026 at 12:55, service@simsonn.com

Still nothing?

On Thu, 15 Jan 2026 at 17:45, Andrei Vasilescu <avasilescu98@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Please do your best, it’s been too long already..
>
> Thank you,
> Andrei
>
> On Thu, 15 Jan 2026 at 12:55, service@simsonn.com

This is still in Germany.. if you don’t send a replacement and resolve the
issue with DHL Germany, I’m asking for a refund.

On Sat, 17 Jan 2026 at 23:54, Andrei Vasilescu <avasilescu98@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Still nothing?
>
> On Thu, 15 Jan 2026 at 17:45, Andrei Vasilescu <avasilescu98@gmail.com>
> wrote:

>> Please do your best, it’s been too long already..
>>
>> Thank you,
>> Andrei
